Posts.Content: My wife was diagnosed with breast cancer in April 2000. A sentinel node was found to be positive and three nodes beyond were found to be clean were removed with a portion of her left breast. She had cemo teatment and radiation treatments following the surgery. She will have finished finished five years of Tamoxifen treatment in December. Her doctor says she is low risk for recurrence. She needs to decide whether she should go on an Aromatase inhibitor such as Arimidex or Femara. Her doctor say's its her call and will not make a recommendation. She is concerned about the lack of a long term track record for these drugs and the two sideaffects (osteoporosis)associated with them. She is looking for some in put from others who have experience with these two drugs.
Posts.Title: What to Use After Using Tamoxifen
